content.detailedDescription: On july 4th 2015 my wife and i were coming home form a gill out. as we started pulling in our drive way. we saw these lights in the sky seven of them at one end 3 were in a triangle while the rest were in a line behind them. they were not like planes or helicopters they were solid lights. if you saw them you new they were something else. we watched they as they faded away in the night then more came from the east to were the other were at then they faded away too. this happened three or four times. we could not believe what we were seeing. we tried to get picture but they would not show up on the camera because it was so dark out side.
content.summary: My wife and i saw lights in the sky not normal lights you see.

content.detailedDescription: I ma not sure if this worthy enough information for you, but i was lying in bed speaking into my dictaphone for a biography that i am writing.  i always look out of my window at night as it helps me to think more clearly.  i watch the satellites that drift across the sky and 2 maybe three times a week i see meteors, nothing unusual. it was 2.Ooam when i saw a meteor, they still fascinate me.  then at 204am i had just recorded something on my dictaphone then looked at my ceiling for approx. 3 seconds so the constellations had not moved, but when i looked back out of the window these two bright lights had suddenly appeared, and it startled me.  they stood vertically one above the other and were much brighter than any of the stars that i had seen over my years of star gazing.  i knew that venus was appearing every night, but that was on the other side of my apartment, about 170 degrees in the other direction, plus there was two of them.  i am guessing that they were 30 degrees from the horizon and i had the sense that they were a long way off but cannot be sure.  the lights would have been too bright for oncoming aircraft and i am also familiar with commercial flight paths in that area and at that time in the morning it was very unusual.  also there was two of them and all the planes that i see at night, i can usually see their red navigation port light and their green navigational starboard light on their wings, if they are too high or far away they just appear as a flashing white light.  when i see the white bow light of an oncoming aircraft, it will dim as it starts to turn direction and of course is always moving.  these lights remained motionless for five minutes then began to slowly dim and then turned off instantly.  i knew that the batteries were flat in my camcorder as i had not used it since my last holiday so unfortunately i could not use it, and besides my eyes were fixed on the objects. i had a strange reason that i did not want them to se me, subconsciously maybe i felt that there was intelligence involved.  i know a bit about astronomy but i can not come to a conclusion about what i saw. they were just two lights in the sky but it plays on my mind.  maybe it some sort of natural phenomena that occurs. i hope that this small piece of information may be relevant to you somehow.  yours sincerely robert james brook.
content.summary: Unknown lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: After dark around 10/11p participating at a celebration  with music and personal fireworks. multiple eye witnesses noticed orange star like object above the trees seemed to be stationarylike a planet and  moved as if on a trajectory similar to iss, same speed  . object went below tree line and was seen hovering through trees then it was just gone. some  on what it could b. multiple eye witnesses  ex military navigator. we used binoculars to try and see but  was not trackable whe lost in tree line. object appeared again in same  position above  and seemed to hover stationary. then orange glow faded as if object were flying  on a straight line, altitude and refectory never changed. object faded away within 3 minutes of second sighting. no sightings after that. we were on kentucky lake facing  mueey ky. bject was not over water our near reflec surfac. fireworks were small and below tree  .
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange blinking starlike light above tree line stayed still then moved as if lowering altitude in same manner as iss, lost it in trees. object reappeared in original position and seemed to hover then fade as if getting farther away. multiple witnesses

content.detailedDescription: After dark around 10/11p participating at a celebration  with music and personal fireworks. multiple eye witnesses noticed orange star like object above the trees seemed to be stationarylike a planet and  moved as if on a trajectory similar to iss, same speed  . object went below tree line and was seen hovering through trees then it was just gone. some  on what it could b. multiple eye witnesses  ex military navigator. we used binoculars to try and see but  was not trackable whe lost in tree line. object appeared again in same  position above  and seemed to hover stationary. then orange glow faded as if object were flying  on a straight line, altitude and refectory never changed. object faded away within 3 minutes of second sighting. no sightings after that. we were on kentucky lake facing  mueey ky. bject was not over water our near reflec surfac. fireworks were small and below tree  .
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange blinking starlike light above tree line stayed still then moved as if lowering altitude in same manner as iss, lost it in trees. object reappeared in original position and seemed to hover then fade as if getting farther away. multiple witnesses

content.detailedDescription: I've witnessed an orb in the past when fireworks were present. i have also read and heard they are attracted to fireworks.  so, i took my phone out and was armed and ready for shots of at least one on the evening of july 4, 2015.  turns out i saw 3 following one another and about 10 minutes later another one. the way the lights were pulsating it couldn't of been a chinese lantern. too strong of a pulse.  the first 3 were over 2000 feet high and started to climb through the clouds until disappeared. the last one was somewhat lower and took a different path of the previous 3. my husband has an atp rating and has flown for 40 years. i called him out to look. he said it didn't have the navigational colored lights on them like a plane would have. i asked him what the altitude was and he said around 2000 feet and was climbing by the time he got outside. my brother took a photo as well of an orb last night (4th of july) in tennessee. he was around fireworks himself. i had told him about these being seen around fireworks. his photo was similar to what i took. he was hunting once  around the 4 corners area and saw a strange light at night. it made him feel uneasy and went back to his vehicle and slept the night in it. he said he also called his wife to tell her.  a couple of my photos when blown up look like there could be a solid object in center. i'll leave that for the professionals to figure out. i would like for someone to look at these photos blown up and tell me what their thoughts are on what these could be. so please get back with me concerning photos and video. you will see two separate pulsating lights in the video. the video isn't long because i wanted to zoom in on the objects and i couldn't do that with video on my phone. i started taking still shots. the video shows the 4th and last one that came by. it was lower and climbed into the clouds out of sight. it also had somewhat a different flight path.
content.summary: Pulsating red orange light.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside in our backyard trying to get a glimpse of a fourth of july fireworks show to the south, however, i could not see anything. i turned to the north to go back inside, where there is usually nothing but a mountain range, i saw two bright green lights ascending straight up from the mountain. the lights were so bright and large, i thought a helicopter would be flying over my head in a second. instead the vehicle stopped it’s straight up vertical assent in midair and hovered there completely silent and changed colors from green to red once stationary. there it stayed completely still and silent for several minutes. i yelled for my husband to come outside and he did. as he walked out of our patio door, he said, “what is that?” but he was looking in the wrong direction. i was facing west looking at the mountain range and he was facing east looking at the same mountain range. he was now telling me to look at what he was seeing and was i telling him to turn around and look at what i was seeing. he finally did so and then the vehicle which was stationary and red, turned green again and descended back down into the mountain range. he next looked back to the east to see if what he had originally seen was still there and it was not. he said, “call me if it comes back, i am going to get my camera.” it wasn’t but a few minutes when i yelled back into the house that it was back, as it was bright green again and raising straight up out of the mountain range. he was now outside with his nikon and a tripod which he positioned on our patio dining table. once ascended, the vehicle turned red again and was perfectly still for 20 minutes plus. my son and his girlfriend had time to come outside, pull up patio chairs, get binoculars, go back inside to get their jackets as we watched the vehicle hover in midair for 25 minutes. i then spotted a small airplane rounding and banking straight towards us and the unknown craft. at this exact point, the craft moved slightly, then made a 360 turn, turned from red to green and descended back down into the mountain range and finally out of slight. i thought as soon as the plane passed, it would reemerge again, but then realized that everyone who had been turned east to watch various firework shows in the valley, were now most likely moving around and driving around and if the craft had enjoyed 30 minutes of privacy, that was now over, as well as, the fireworks. needless to say, it did not reemerge. many things went through my mind as to what this could be. a very large drone videotaping the san gabriel valley and inland empire firework shows, or a friendly ufo, who picked the perfect time to play a visit. either way, we captured 5 videos and enjoyed watching whatever it was, more than we would have enjoyed watching fireworks and sitting in traffic.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 5  videos -green lights asend from mountain, then stationary howering & lights turn red, then descend & lights turn green - 25 mins

content.detailedDescription: I was outside starring into the sky night sky around 1am when i saw a object moving.This isn't my first time seeing this object. i've seen it other times in the same area but this time for the longest amount of time. it was starlike but had slight differences from a star. it wasn't as bright as a star and moving throughout space freely. i watched the object move many times and sometimes in zig zag and circles.This object had a flashing light or type of beacon on the bottom. i the object looked like it being operated and driving with intention of going some where or just watching us. the object would stop and sit idle it would flash a flight or move in a circle like pattern.The appeared to within seeing distance but further than the moon. i watched the object until i couldnt see it due to the light flashing on and off. when i tried to record the object on my phone i couldn't anything just the moon.
content.summary: a flashing starlike object flying through the sky

content.detailedDescription: It was about 10:45pm lighting fireworks as none were going to be lit this year fair a bust. we noticed a reddish orange orb type craft in the air flying straight line then disappeared about 5 minutes later it was behind us again in the east as we looked at it it stopped in the air and reversed direction. there were5 adults who seen this all g with 3 children at the time.
content.summary: Seen twice have short video on phone 20 seconds straight path second stop mid air reverse directon

content.detailedDescription:
At the time we were kids. i believe maybe around 1966, it was summer and like all kids we were out running around.  there wer maybe 4 or 5 of us at the time. standing outside of my house for some reason i looked up and pointed the disk out to my friends.  it made no noise but was spinning and lights were circling on the bottom.  the lights were patterned. red, blue, and i,can't remember if there were any other colors.  we were quite excited by this time. it stayed over us for maybe 30 seconds and then it zipped off. but we could still see it going like it might have been in distress.  of course never seeing anything like this we ran after it thinking it would come down where we could find it. as far as i know it didn't come down.

on one other occasion, it was dark just about dusk or a little darker.  i saw triangle shaped ships standing still in my grandmothers yard. there were 6 of them.  they stood still like they were just hanging there no noise.  i called my father and he saw them too.  he told me never to mention it anyone.  so i didn't.  now i am going on 65 and i think someone should know about this.  i figure they were around because of the army base.  i know it's late to tell anyone now but i thought it should be told.  please know there is something out there, i will never doubt it.  the image will always be with me.  for about 2 years i never felt that i was alone, but it wasn't a bad thing.  i don't fully understand why i felt this way but i did.
content.summary: Came over house we saw it above us

content.detailedDescription: I was bird watching on my back porch, facing east. glanced up and saw an object. not smooth. it was starlike, multiple points coming out from the center in all directions. it was close enough to see shape and form. i live on an island and from the direction i was looking the coast is about 4 miles away, the oject appeared to be over land. once i became aware of it, i observed the object appeared bright white. it was in the full sun. the sun was behind me and the time was approximately 6:20.I kept staring, waiting for it to move so i could tell what it was. in the moments (about a minute and a half, too long lor any common thing to be stationary)  watching, it never moved or wavered at all. i heard no sound. i live in close proximity to 3 major airports and am quite familiar with flight patterns and even helicoper patterns in my area. it's lack of movement was most striking. once it sunk in that this is no ordinary object, i wanted to get my binoculars as i stood up to retrieve them the object moved (glided) slowly south and was obscured by a tree. i reached for the binoculars and ran into the yard to see if i could find it behind the tree but it was gone.
content.summary: Noticed a stationary starlike object in east. motionless, no sound. after a minute or so, it travelled south behind a tree. lost sight.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of july 4th 2015 around 9 30pm as i was watching fireworks that a neighbor was putting on a show from across a canal  my mother and i witnessed 2 circular objects in the sky watching the fireworks they hovered for about 3 minutes then slowly went off in the distance.  we did not hear any motor sounds i ran for my i pad to take a picture then they were gone.  i contacted the police dept to ask if any helicopters were in the area and they said no.

Friends and i were having a sleepover. big brother babysitting inside. parents on vacation. sighting of strange erratic, controlled movements of a bright "star" looking out 17 miles away over the lake toward the east....Just star-gazing. over 150 people reported this sighting and phoned that night and next morning to the local radio station. all kinds of erratic flight under direct control of someone.....Very weird!

also saw small whitish figure in parents' bushes - which we interpreted as a ghost...7th or 8th graders we were. we went inside. not long after the sightings of both things, we had two "fbi agents" at our parents' door, asking if they could do surveillance from our parents house. 

brother explained he didn't have authority to do that....They were definitely like descriptions of the men in black. my girlfriends and i had noticed their car sitting down the road a bit in the dark. when it came down the street towards us, we immediately went into the house. their visit was shortly after that. 

my parents home was one block away from the exact dividing line for the watershed here - one side of the road, the water goes west. east side of the road flows east. the geological location - the multiple sightings and reports of others seeing the craft over the lake - the significance of the watershed lends credence to the idea that it really was someone checking us out or checking out the water situation or both.

i've had multiple sightings of many kinds of aircraft in my life - aviation background owing to parents - and some sightings i had, i came to recognize as close-up views of new technology being shown somehow...Probably testing equipment over snow-covered flat farmlands near where i was taking an early morning drive once ...Again near the lake to the east. different sighting entirely. already reported to ufo researchers in my state. other diverse experiences with this kind of contact throughout my life, really - many forms.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Mass sighting (>150 people reported) over lake; same night entity in back yard

content.detailedDescription:
Approximately 11:05 on july 4th, 2015, my husband and i were returning from spending the day with our daughter and her family. as we turned west onto 180th st, i saw pinkish-orange lights in the sky. at first i thought it was fireworks, but they didn't explode or make any noise. there were five round lights flying together from the northwest towards the southeast. three of them stayed fairly close together, and two of them would move off in different directions, return to the three others, and then move off again. they seemed fairly low in the sky, maybe 1000 feet, although that is just a rough estimation and we had no point of reference.   i could not see any distinguishing features. while fireworks were going off around us at intervals, none were close by, and in the intervals we could tell that there was no sound coming from the slowly moving lights. i thought possibly helicopters, but dismissed that due to the silence and the random flying formation. i stopped the car and asked my husband, do you see that? what is that? and he said he saw them and didn't know what they were. i looked around but there were no other people out on the street, or i would have called their attention to the objects. 

we saw these lights float gracefully and slowly, in absolute silence, over us and heading towards the southeast. we did not grab cameras although i thought about it, but my phone is new and by the time i could have figured out how to take pictures, the lights were gone. they just blinked out.  i asked my husband, “did we just see a ufo?” and before he could answer i said, “well, we don’t know what it is and it’s flying, so by definition, it is.” 

we had been driving down i-5 for an hour and fireworks had been going off at intervals, so we were kind of keeping an eye on the sky. at first, when i saw these lights, i thought, "fireworks" but as they moved so slowly and silently, i changed that to "helicopters?" and thought, no. has to be ufo. there was no chopper sound. i was interested and curious and a little excited, but not frightened. my husband describes his emotional response as "interested."

given that it was independence day, i should add that neither my husband nor i had had any alcohol during the day. we do not use any recreational drugs. we had been a little tired coming home, but had full use of our faculties and had been talking in the car- neither of us had fallen asleep.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Five glowing lights, floating silently overhead from nw to se. changed directions but overall kept heading se

content.detailedDescription: While driving down a very remote road to work around 2am i saw a red orb star like object, at first i thought it was the top of a radio antenna but then remembers there where none in the area, as i drove closer it changed to white and hovered to the other side of the road about 500', i had the window down and there was no sound. as i drove even closer it changed to a blue color and after a couple of seconds shot off into the sky at incredible speed. i was perty scared since at points in the drive you can see the road for miles and there where no other vehicles in the area so i felt if something happened id be completely alone. when i got to work i told me coworkers but they thought i was full of it.
content.summary: Hovering light, changed colors position then shot off.

content.detailedDescription: We were traveling west on interstate 40 around 8 p.M. with a beautiful sunset in view. i decided to snap a few photos of the sunset. i took three consecutive pictures and immediately  looked at the photos to see if they were good ones. upon looking at the photos i observed an orb to the right of the sunset with lights inside of it. i instantly observed the horizon again and the object was gone. i immediately took more photos in that direction but no orb was seen in any. we were driving so i could not identify any sound. in the photos the orb seems to move right and then left again. i researched the sighting to see if the image could relate and be explaind, but discovered no conclusion, therefore i am reporting it to you. the last photo uploaded was zoomed in from original photo.
content.summary: Orb with lights sighted in horizon in arizona 6/23/15

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were at the avon ball field, with our dogs and trying to see some fireworks. we forgot the bug spray, so she drove home to get the spray. i noticed a father an daughter playing with a glider plain. as my wife drove off i was watching the kid fly her plane. i was on a blanket and the dogs started barking. looking in the direction of the girl and her dad. above them over the trees i saw an orb like orange and yellow object rising from the south east heading south east. at first this was about 9:30 pm  this thing was moving and ascending slow by the distance it was hard to tell the size. but as it moved to the south it gained height and moved slow. i texted my friend adam he and his family live right across from the park. i am sure he thought i was messing with him, he came over and this thing still glowing  and moved up and out fast to the south.He looked in the direction and it got smaller and was gone. my wife came back and the father and his daughter walked over with her to see the dogs that were still barking. i told her and the father and adam who were still there what happened . then low to the south heading to the east it appeared with all of us wondering what it is. my wife took out her phone and videoed it move up and south to south east. adam took out his phone and fallowed it our view was slight lee hiding by the trees. the at first i thought it to be a candle box but it was not going with the wind. the girl said that the candle box burn out and fall. i taught she was wright.But this never burned out.Adam came back in disbursal. we talked about it for a wile and the father and daughter left. we packed up and said good night to adam and drove home, about a 1 minute ride , that's why i was so accurate  with the directions of the orb.When we got home i was on the deck looking at the big dipper south east sky and there it was bright and still i called my wife and she taped it again for about five minutes, it moved up to the south east and slow.Then it picked up speed and was heeding south east on an angle higher and faster and was gone.    thank you steven baiona
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: First seen from moving abouv trees . called friend, and reappard for half hour 5 or 6 times.

content.detailedDescription:
During a fireworks display at delco park on july 4th at 10:000pm my sister pointed out to me a strange object hovering in the sky directly to ourright. we had been sitting outside of the fence and facing the display.

the object was seemingly a flat disc in the sky that looked abut the size of an airplane. the object was giving off a bluish purple light with a red dot of light in the center. it was completely stationary for about five minutes before slowly descending behind a tree. it came back up a few minutes later and moved up  and down slowly for the rest of the display. as soon as the fireworks ended, the object turned red and slowly decended again.

as we walked down the street, a large fireball, about the size of an aspirin, ascended in the sky. soon after i noticed two more. together they created a triangle pattern across the sky.  the fireballs continued their slow path upwards until they shot upwards into the sky at the same time at incredible speed, disappearing from sight.

my family pointed out the aircraft to onlookers who were equally astonished. no fireworks seemed to cause these events.
content.summary: Unexplainable orbs and discs of light witnessed during and after fireworks display

content.detailedDescription:
On friday july 3rd 2015 at 9:20pm as i was leaving the nice-n-easy parking lot in phoenix, ny, i saw a stationary object in the southern sky above st. stephen’s church.  i extended my left arm toward the object and raised my thumb as a reference for size.  this object was the size of my thumbnail.  i estimated it to be approximately eight hundred feet above the ground.  i based this estimate on the objects location in relation to the peak of st stevens church below it, and the cumulus cloud cover behind it.  i would describe this object as a ball of light.  it was bright red, and twinkled orange to yellow at its core.  i had determined at this point it was not an airplane, helicopter, drone, or fire work flare.  it was stationary.  there was no sound associated with the object.  
i drove out of the parking lot on to culver street and traveled west intending to cross the bridge to lock island.  i continued to view the object.  i slowed down in order to observe the object for three or four seconds at a glance.  the object was now moving west parallel to my line of travel.  it had matched my speed of fifteen miles an hour and was visible at sixty degrees to my left as i traveled south west.  while i was on the bridge i again compared the object to the landscape and my thumb nail.  the cumulus cloud cover remained a reliable reference in the background.  it was now just above the trees located in the area of the old paper mill.  i estimated the object to be approximately two hundred feet above the ground.  its size was still consistent with my thumbnail.   
i continued on lamson road and turned onto pendegast road. after traveling only a short distance, i pulled to the side of the road.  the object was behind me.  i stepped out of my truck.  at this point the object passed very close to me, approximately fifteen degrees off my zenith.  as the object moved in front of me i began to record it on my cell phone.  it was now in front of me traveling in a northwest direction.  the object climbed steadily and maintained a trajectory of approximately sixty degrees above the horizon.
the length of my recording was forty-one seconds. the time stamp of the recording was 20150707_213513.  i estimate the entire event lasted approximately fifteen minutes.  
if you have questions please contact me i would be happy to talk with you.
content.summary: A observed a ball of light.  it was bright red, and twinkled orange to yellow at its core.

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were at presque isle, lake erie from 7/2/2015-7/4/2015. i had heard about the orange orbs that come out at night around the 4th of july, so i wanted to see if there was any chance we could spot them. one of the nights we were there, we decided to get right on the edge of the lake to try and get a good vantage point. i had heard that the orbs are mostly sighted between 8:30 and 10:30 pm. we were on top of a small bank facing north, probably a couple hundred yards from the lake and about 100 feet about the water level. a couple minutes past 10:30 pm (if i had to guess, i would say 10:32) we saw a circular red/orange light come up above the tree line off to our right. it crossed the sky travelling from east to west. we looked at it through our binoculars, and it looked like there was some kind of flame at the bottom, so part of me was thinking it could have been a chinese lantern...But this object was moving fast. faster than a any chinese lantern probably could. as soon as we saw it, i became very excited, but also quite scared. i was able to take a picture of it with my phone, but the quality is very poor. as it crossed the sky it seemed like it was getting a little smaller than when it first appeared, but then again, i have no idea how to distinguish a change in size from a change in altitude. it then started to descend ever so slightly, and started to get dimmer and dimmer until it was no longer visible. if i had guess, i would say that the entire phenomenon probably lasted about 30 seconds. the remarkable thing was, exactly 10 minutes later (about 10:42) a second orb appeared. it looked exactly the same as the first and had the exact same flight pattern. we waited for a 3rd one to appear, but it never came. i'm going to be looking for these things a lot more that that i have actually seen them with my own eyes.
content.summary: Orange orbs over lake erie

content.detailedDescription: We were watching fireworks. saw orange red orb hovering. tried to film on camera that had been fully charged..Camera went dead. ran into house..Grabbed other camera..In 5 seconds it was gone.
content.summary: Orange-red orb

content.detailedDescription: I see them almost every night during the summer. they usually show up in the same location as in the videos but sometimes in other places. i have seen many ufo's in my life, it is almost as if they are following me.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orbs flying very close to the ground appearing and disappearing out of nowhere.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette sitting in/on my trunk. i was texting someone then i looked up to the sky and i see something big and bright to my left peripheral and i looked and thought it was a huge firework about to explode...But it remained as a fireball. so i kept watching it and i couldn't comprehend wtf that is..I started feeling freaked out and was trying to pull out my other phone that has a better camera. finally when i got it out i tooke these pictures thinking its not gonna show on my screen cuz its a camera phone and it can't capture night sky...But when i saw that it was visible on the screen i snapped two pics..Then was looking around to see if anybody was outside seeing the same thing but saw no one. so i got my other phone and dialed my sister as fast as i could while watching it slowly moving at the same pace..And when she answered i quickly asked what does a drone look like when its flying??? and as she was explaining it turned left and was going a different path..And after a second or two it started slowly dimming out and as i was trying to comprehend what my sister was saying it dimmed out completely and i lost the site of it and where it had gone. seeing that made me freak out. considering that i was alone seeing this type of thing i felt a bit panicked.
content.summary: Noticeably red-orange large fireball like movingly forward slowly then goes left then slowly dims

content.detailedDescription:
1) i was camping with a friend in ossian indiana at his moms house.
2) we where laying in our sleeping bags, when we noticed a hovering object to our right floating above the trees with some light beam which looked to be scanning the woods.
3) i questioned my friend asking, what the hell is in the shape of a triangle that hovers. only explanation we had was ufo. it scared us.
4) the object would move 50 or so yards in a direction over these woods, shine a light beam which moved in various directions. this beam came from the object. 
5) i was scared and excited at the same time. i just laid in my sleeping bag looking at this object in the distance. trying to get some make or idea to bring any clarity to what it could be.
6) eventually it moved on going deeper into the woods where coverage became a problem in seeing it. though you could see the light beam occasionally in the woods in the distance. eventually it just vanished from my site.
content.summary: Was camping with friend, it flew over the woods we where in.

content.detailedDescription: We were at amanda's field waiting for the fireworks to start. we thought it was the beginning of the fireworks but this large oval like object that was a reddish orange hovered in the sky then proceeded to change path and slowly crossed the sky. right before our eyes it just disappeared! we were all in amazement and couldn't believe our eyes. it moved very slow at first then quickly left.
content.summary: Ufo before fireworks

content.detailedDescription: I was at the fire works show laying on the beach i happened to look straight up and saw a red blimp shaped object i have never seen anything like it and i'm 44 years old so i kept watching then all at once it turned green and then it moved east at a speed i've never seen any plane move not even close and then a dead stop then it moved west then stopped again and went east again but a lot slower and then it disappeared.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Started red changed to green hovering then moved unexplainebly fast and then a dead stop

content.detailedDescription: We were watching fire works when my brother thought he seen a bright star -got closer were it looked like it was slowing down--no blinking lights--like a man made object--because it had no sound--and could just stop-and stay in one place-it had a color i have never seen before-like a bright orange--light--no flames--kinda dull orange--stayed in one place for 3 min-them slowly took off east-to the cascades
content.summary: It had no blinking lights--solid orange--came in bright--fast--like a star--slowed way down--stoped - hoverd-slowy took off to the east--to the mt hood area-at a fast speed--to fast for a balloon--or helecoptor--with no sound

content.detailedDescription: First observed 4 lights at varying altitudes above the potomac river at colonial beach, virginia at 2315 hours.  highest light would disappear and then would see another at less than 500 feet moving up the river at a high rate of speed.  light would then hover and appear to move up and away from observer until disappearing at approximately 5000 feet asl.  at the time the highest light would disappear, another would come moving in on the same path as the previous. each would remain visible for approximately 1 minute.  at all times 4 lights were seen.  my friend was also a witness to this event.  i was able to capture a one minute 15 second cell phone video of the event.  there were no sounds heard other than cars and golf carts.  my friend and i went to walk towards the river to get a better view of the event and at that time all lights disappeared and were not seen again that night.
content.summary: 4 lights at varify altitude,

content.detailedDescription: I was about 7 years old at the time and was playing games in the street. they would barricade both ends of the street and the church across the street (incarnation catholic church) would have adults and older teens supervise the children playing street games, such as basketball, shuffleboard, street hockey, etc. at dusk they would begin bringing in any equipment used back into the church. as this was happening at the intersection of st. nicholas ave. and 175st. i turned my head and noticed out of the corner of my eye to my left a craft in the air. as a kid i loved watching airplanes and a rare occasional blimp if i was lucky. at first i thought it might be a blimp because of the slow movement, but as it got closer i realized that it was a disk. i noticed that it was totally quiet. the bottom was flat and reflective and looked like modern stainless steel, but darker in color. the top had windows the turned slowly in groups of twos and threes. for example, it would be two close together and a space, then three together and a space after. i observed it for about a minute before i yelled out, "flying saucer." after that i remember hearing a lot of the adults talking about it as it moved slowly north in a straight line towards the area of the george washington bridge. i watched it for approximately seven minutes in total before running upstairs to tell my mom what i had just seen. this is what i remember to the best of my recollection. there were many witnesses, but it happened so long ago that i don't remember anyone else besides my sister that was a witness. unfortunately she past away 18 years ago.
content.summary: Observed disk moving slowly in air with windows revolving in twos and threes.

content.detailedDescription: Noticed this object in the sky as the fireworks display at the thornton rec center was going on.  object was stationary for quite some time with red and green flashing lights.  moved backwards abruptly and remained stationary for a couple more minutes at the same altitude.  as the grand finale of the fireworks started, the object disappeared.
content.summary: Red and green stationary object.

content.detailedDescription: I was home and needed to get a couple car parts from the auto parts store so a friend and me get into my car, we pull out of my driveway and i got about 20 to 30 feet away from my house when my friend pointed at the sky to my left (at this point i'm in the drivers seat facing east) i look up to the sky to see 6 orbs of light getting in a straight line from west to east just north of me it seemed as if there was a head orb that reached the point where it needed to stop then the next two stopped next to it and the other stopped next to those as well on either side. as this is happening were just amazed and step out of the car for a second i drive back to my house and run inside to get my friends to come out and see. all of them then say that we're losing it, they then come outside thinking they will not see anything. when we all step outside (at this point there's 7-10 of us) to then be amazed at what they're also seeing because the orbs are just hovering there's no noise and they start moving back and forth slowly. by this time there's only 3-4 left and they are no longer trying to keep a straight line (when i came out the two that werent on line can be seen headed north at a high speed with no sound) after seeing this everyone starts talking about it inside the house i go to the auto parts but i'm still in total shock of what i just saw. i then make a post on facebook and got a lot of negative comments but also got some comments of others seeing similar things a city or two over from me on that same night and days/weeks after
content.summary: I saw 6 hovering lights line up in a line then 2 took off while others continued hovering
